Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails and review the task list for today.
Finalize the presentation summarizing the proposed data quality metrics, weekly targets, and methodology.
Present the data quality metrics and targets proposal to @clinlead-1, @his-1, and @itpm-1. Gather feedback and address any concerns. Topic: 'Data Quality Metrics and Targets Proposal'.
Incorporate feedback received during the presentation into the data quality metrics and targets proposal. Make any necessary revisions and adjustments.
Lunch break. Catch up with colleagues.
Document the final data quality metrics and weekly targets, including definitions, calculation methods, and rationale for the chosen targets.

Collaborate with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 to explore how the data quality metrics can be integrated into the EHR system for ongoing monitoring and reporting. Topic: 'Integration of Data Quality Metrics into EHR System'.
Develop a plan for communicating the data quality metrics and targets to relevant stakeholders, including clinicians, nurses, and medical records staff. @trainer-1 to assist with the plan.
Review the day's work and update the project plan with progress and any identified risks or issues.
Prepare for tomorrow's tasks and create a detailed task list.
